Side $\overline{AB}$ of $\triangle ABC$ has length $10$. The bisector of angle $A$ meets $\overline{BC}$ at $D$, and $CD = 3$. The set of all possible values of $AC$ is an open interval $(m,n)$. What is $m+n$?\\
\\
$
\textbf{(A) }16 \qquad
\textbf{(B) }17 \qquad
\textbf{(C) }18 \qquad
\textbf{(D) }19 \qquad
\textbf{(E) }20 \qquad
$
